Methods

GetInCurrency(in SignedQuantity, double, double, Instrument, double)

Calculates current profit in currency of the instrument. GetInPrice(TradeAction, double, double), GetInPoints(TradeAction, double, double, Instrument, bool), GetInTicks(TradeAction, double, double, Instrument)

public static double GetInCurrency(in SignedQuantity positionSignedQuantity, double entryPrice, double exitPrice, Instrument instrument, double pointValue)

Parameters

positionSignedQuantity SignedQuantity

A quantity of position. Negative values mean Short position (sell), positive values - Long position (buy)

entryPrice double

An initial price at which a position/trade was created

exitPrice double

Final price (exit price or current market price)

instrument Instrument

Instrument to get point size and point value

pointValue double

An optional parameter to define a point value. Usually, a point value calculates for account currency or for instrument base currency. For instrument base currency, you can specify NaN that will be equal to PointValue

Returns

double

GetInCurrency(TradeAction, in Quantity, double, double, Instrument, double)

Calculates current profit in currency of the instrument. GetInPrice(TradeAction, double, double), GetInPoints(TradeAction, double, double, Instrument, bool), GetInTicks(TradeAction, double, double, Instrument)

public static double GetInCurrency(TradeAction direction, in Quantity positionAbsQuantity, double entryPrice, double exitPrice, Instrument instrument, double pointValue)

Parameters

direction TradeAction
positionAbsQuantity Quantity

A quantity of position

entryPrice double

An initial price at which a position/trade was created

exitPrice double

Final price (exit price or current market price)

instrument Instrument

Instrument to get point size and point value

pointValue double

An optional parameter to define a point value. Usually, a point value calculates for account currency or for instrument base currency. For instrument base currency, you can specify NaN that will be equal to PointValue

Returns

double

GetInPercent(TradeAction, double, double)

Calculates the current profit of position as % of change: delta / entry price *100

public static double GetInPercent(TradeAction tradeAction, double entryPrice, double exitPrice)

Parameters

tradeAction TradeAction

Direction of the position

entryPrice double

An initial price at which a position/trade was created

exitPrice double

Final price (exit price or current market price)

Returns

double

Examples

Consider the position: buy, entry price = 50.00, current price is 60.00. Current profit = (60-50)/50*100 = 20%

GetInPoints(TradeAction, double, double, Instrument, bool)

Calculates current profit of position in points. GetInPrice(TradeAction, double, double)

public static double GetInPoints(TradeAction tradeAction, double entryPrice, double exitPrice, Instrument instrument, bool roundResult = true)

Parameters

tradeAction TradeAction

Direction of the position

entryPrice double

An initial price at which a position/trade was created

exitPrice double

Final price (exit price or current market price)

instrument Instrument

Instrument, to which specified prices relate

roundResult bool

If true, result value will be rounded to remove fractional part

Returns

double

A floating point value that defines a number of points (including a fractional part) between entryPrice and . If roundResult is true, the result value will be rounded to remove fractional part

Remarks

To convert a floating point result value to integral value use MathRoundToLong(double) or use method GetInPointsLong(TradeAction, double, double, Instrument) to get integral value directly

GetInPointsLong(TradeAction, double, double, Instrument)

Calculates current profit of position in points using GetInPoints(TradeAction, double, double, Instrument, bool) and rounds it to a long value

public static long GetInPointsLong(TradeAction tradeAction, double entryPrice, double exitPrice, Instrument instrument)

Parameters

tradeAction TradeAction

Direction of the position

entryPrice double

An initial price at which a position/trade was created

exitPrice double

Final price (exit price or current market price)

instrument Instrument

Instrument, to which specified prices relate

Returns

long

An integral point value that defines a number of points between entryPrice and . If input prices are not correct (for example, NaN), it returns 0

GetInPrice(TradeAction, double, double)

Calculates current profit of position in price: current market price - entry price

public static double GetInPrice(TradeAction tradeAction, double entryPrice, double exitPrice)
